tag.description: The namespace and ID of the tag which the biome should be in to pass the check.
tag.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the tag which the biome should be in to pass the check.

type.description:
## In Tag --- [Biome Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/biome_condition_types/in_tag) Checks whether the biome is in a specified tag. Type ID: `origins:in_tag` --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn" } ``` This example will check if the biome is included in the `#minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn` (`data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/allows_surface_slime_spawn.json`) biome tag.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:is_forest", "inverted": true } ``` This example will check if the biome is __not__ included in the `#minecraft:is_forest` (`data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/is_forest.json`) biome tag.
type.markdownDescription:
## In Tag --- [Biome Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/biome_condition_types/in_tag) Checks whether the biome is in a specified tag. Type ID: `origins:in_tag` --- ### Examples ```json "condition": { "type": "origins:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn" } ``` This example will check if the biome is included in the `#minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn` (`data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/allows_surface_slime_spawn.json`) biome tag.
```json "condition": { "type": "origins:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:is_forest", "inverted": true } ``` This example will check if the biome is __not__ included in the `#minecraft:is_forest` (`data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/is_forest.json`) biome tag.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: In Tag (Biome Condition Type) date: 2022-11-05

In Tag

Biome Condition Type

Checks whether the biome is in a specified tag.

Type ID: origins:in_tag

Fields

Field Type Default Description
tag Identifier The namespace and ID of the tag which the biome should be in to pass the check.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn"
}

This example will check if the biome is included in the #minecraft:allows_surface_slime_spawn (data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/allows_surface_slime_spawn.json) biome tag. 

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:is_forest",
    "inverted": true
}

This example will check if the biome is not included in the #minecraft:is_forest (data/minecraft/tags/worldgen/biome/is_forest.json) biome tag.
